>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/cosmos/nft/v1beta1/nfts/{class_id}/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



NFT queries an NFT based on its class and id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"class_id associated with the nft","name":"class_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"id is a unique identifier of the NFT","name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"QueryNFTResponse is the response type for the Query/NFT RPC method","properties":{"nft":{"title":"owner is the owner address of the nft","description":"NFT defines the NFT.","type":"object","properties":{"class_id":{"type":"string","title":"class_id associated with the NFT, similar to the contract address of ERC721"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{},"title":"data is an app specific data of the NFT. Optional"},"id":{"type":"string","title":"id is a unique identifier of the NFT"},"uri":{"type":"string","title":"uri for the NFT metadata stored off chain"},"uri_hash":{"type":"string","title":"uri_hash is a hash of the document pointed by uri"}}}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
